title: FS:  T206 color variation, wet sheet transfer

posts.post_title: FS:  T206 color variation, wet sheet transfer
posts.post_content:
Obak Rapps wet sheet transfer.  Really nice card even without the wet sheet transfer, though there is a scratch (not a crease) at the middle right.  SOLD

T206 Red Dooin with orange turtleneck $45 delivered.
T206 Fred Beck albino SOLD
T206 Rube Waddell, gray sky (not blue) SOLD

Prices do not include the "correct versions" shown for comparison only.

All backs not shown are clean with scans available.

Mark
